name: Serious Coffee
address: 900 Carnarvon St, New Westminster, BC V3M 0K4, Canada

hasMenuItem.name: Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature espresso beans, timed perfectly for the right taste and crema. After it's topped with your choice of steamed silky smooth milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Breakfast Bagel
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy one of our custom made Breakfast bagels. Choose from a variety of fresh bagels topped with wholesome ingredients and real cheese. (Includes house made chipotle sauce & Eggs with salt and pepper.)

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich - Custom
hasMenuItem.description: Ooey & Gooey, full of cheese and flavours. Customize your grilled cheese sandwich they way you like.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy this creamy rich caramel drink with hints of vanilla and our signature espresso throughout. Top it with whipped cream and it's a delightful treat!

hasMenuItem.name: Breakfast Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Super delicious and will be your new favorite breakfast sandwich. A Potato Bun topped with Bacon, Onion, Tomato, Bell Peppers, Spinach, Real Cheddar Cheese, Egg, Salt and Pepper, and Chipotle Sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Bagel
hasMenuItem.description: Our bagels are prepared fresh daily. Enjoy them with butter, cream cheese or one of our other spreads.

hasMenuItem.name: LumberJack Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: This wrap is loaded with Italian sausage, bacon, ham, cheddar cheese, roasted potatoes, and scrambled eggs topped with a chipotle sauce. It is the perfect to-go or in-cafe breakfast to help you start your day.

hasMenuItem.name: Caramel Macchiato
hasMenuItem.description: It is a drink full of sweet goodness. It's our signature espresso shot mixed with caramel and vanilla syrup, topped by your choice of silky smooth steam milk. Add whip cream and caramel drizzle to further the experience.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Mocha
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy this chocolatey iced drink with a double shot of our signature espresso blend.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Our iced latte is made the same way as our regular lattes starting with our fresh, air-roasted espresso. Choose from different syrup and milk options to personalize our most popular iced drink.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegetarian Samosa (Vegan)
hasMenuItem.description: Contains wheat, potatoes, peas, carrots, chili, turmeric, garlic, ginger, salt, and spices.

hasMenuItem.name: London Fog
hasMenuItem.description: Stone ground is absorbed in hot water which is powdered earl grey tea leaves with raw sugar added. Standard recipe is earl grey loose leaf tea steeped in hot water and vanilla syrup is added.

hasMenuItem.name: Breakfast Bagel Combo (Coffee/ Americano)
hasMenuItem.description: The breakfast bagel combo is prepared with fresh bagels and ingredients, heated on a panini press. (paired with coffee and a dessert.(Modifications can be made to the sandwich for people with dietary restrictions or preferences. Eggs contain pepper and salt)

hasMenuItem.name: Breakfast Sandwich Combo (Coffee/Americano)
hasMenuItem.description:
The Breakfast Sandwich Combo is a perfect way to start the day. It includes our most popular sandwich with all the vegetables together in a bacon and egg sandwich, paired with a coffee and a dessert. 

(Modifications can be made to the sandwich for people with dietary restrictions or preferences. Included in the sandwich is Bacon, Egg, Salt, Pepper, Chipotle Sauce, Bell Peppers, Spinach, Tomato, Red Onions and Cheddar Cheese).

hasMenuItem.name: Lumberjack Combo (Coffee/Americano)
hasMenuItem.description: The lumberjack is a breakfast burrito made with pieces of baked potato, ham, bacon, eggs, cheese and chipotle sauce. (This item is pre-made and cannot be modified.) Paired with a drink and dessert.

hasMenuItem.name: Eggwich Combo (Coffee/Americano)
hasMenuItem.description: The Eggwich combo is a nice light breakfast and helps get the day started. Choose from bacon, turkey, ham or vegetarian eggwich sandwich, paired with a drink and dessert.(Modifications can be made to the sandwich for people with dietary restrictions or preferences. Includes egg, cheese, pepper, salt and mayonnaise. )

hasMenuItem.name: Breakfast Bagel
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy one of our custom made Breakfast bagels. Choose from a variety of fresh bagels topped with wholesome ingredients and real cheese. (Includes house made chipotle sauce & Eggs with salt and pepper.)

hasMenuItem.name: Breakfast Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Super delicious and will be your new favorite breakfast sandwich. A Potato Bun topped with Bacon, Onion, Tomato, Bell Peppers, Spinach, Real Cheddar Cheese, Egg, Salt and Pepper, and Chipotle Sauce.

hasMenuItem.name: Bagel
hasMenuItem.description: Our bagels are prepared fresh daily. Enjoy them with butter, cream cheese or one of our other spreads.

hasMenuItem.name: LumberJack Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: This wrap is loaded with Italian sausage, bacon, ham, cheddar cheese, roasted potatoes, and scrambled eggs topped with a chipotle sauce. It is the perfect to-go or in-cafe breakfast to help you start your day.

hasMenuItem.name: Ham & Swiss Croissant w. Honey Dijon
hasMenuItem.description: Our buttery croissant is layered with swiss cheese, smoked black forest ham and our honey dijon mustard.

hasMenuItem.name: Protein Power Wrap
hasMenuItem.description: A whole wheat tortilla shell filled with egg whites, quinoa, black bean, spinach, cheddar cheese, chickpea, red pepper, oat, onion, garlic, cilantro, spice and herbs.

hasMenuItem.name: English Muffin Eggwich
hasMenuItem.description: Choose from our many options of Eggwich. Each is made with fresh ingredients and great to eat on the go. Customize it the way you want! Served with egg, salt, pepper, cheese and your choice of meat, sauce on a toasted English muffin.

hasMenuItem.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich - Custom
hasMenuItem.description: Ooey & Gooey, full of cheese and flavours. Customize your grilled cheese sandwich they way you like.

hasMenuItem.name: Turkey Club Sandwich - Custom
hasMenuItem.description: Smoked Turkey (GF), Bacon, Sliced Tomato, Spinach, with Dijon Mayo.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegetarian Sandwich
hasMenuItem.description: Ingredients: Swiss Cheese, Cucumber, Red Onion, Bell Peppers, Tomato, Spinach, Green Leaf Lettuce & Garlic Mayo.

hasMenuItem.name: Signature Brewed Coffee
hasMenuItem.description:
Our top selling dark roast and three amigos are usually on tap. Dark is bold tasting and less caffeine, three amigos is lighter in taste and higher with caffeine.

3 Amigos Cupping Notes: Sweet Corn, Leather, Caramel, & Lemon Zest.
Beans: Colombia, Costa Rica & Mexico

hasMenuItem.name: Swiss Water Decaf Coffee
hasMenuItem.description: Our decaf uses the darkest roast we have called coalminers and is 99.9% caffeine free. Produced by using the swiss-water process, its chemical free and tastes amazing.

hasMenuItem.name: Joe to Go - 96 oz
hasMenuItem.description:
Want to cater your next event with Serious Coffee? Our Joe to Go is perfect for small to big groups of people. It holds 96 oz of freshly ground coffee and is brewed to order.  
Choose from our signature roasted dark coal miners or the medium 3 Amigos. (Inc. 8 x 12 oz cups, cream/milk, sugar packets and stir sticks).

hasMenuItem.name: Shot in the Dark
hasMenuItem.description: A shot in the dark is a perfectly extracted dose of our espresso poured atop a steamy cup of our flavorful medium or dark roasted fresh brewed drip coffee. Reg-two shots, med-two shots, large-four shots.

hasMenuItem.name: Americano
hasMenuItem.description: A cup filled with hot water and followed by a double shot of Serious Coffee's signature espresso mill blend, leaving a layer of golden krema on top.

hasMenuItem.name: Espresso
hasMenuItem.description: A perfectly prepared dose of our signature Espresso will be sure to satisfy your craving for a dark, rich and complex flavor experience. Freshness is the foundation of a great espresso and ours is roasted fresh, delivered fresh, ground fresh, and prepared fresh, just for you. (Prepared as a DBL shot)

hasMenuItem.name: Caramel Macchiato
hasMenuItem.description: It is a drink full of sweet goodness. It's our signature espresso shot mixed with caramel and vanilla syrup, topped by your choice of silky smooth steam milk. Add whip cream and caramel drizzle to further the experience.

hasMenuItem.name: Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature espresso beans, timed perfectly for the right taste and crema. After it's topped with your choice of steamed silky smooth milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Mocha
hasMenuItem.description: Our delicious mochas are made with freshly roasted espresso beans, steamed chocolate milk, topped with whipped cream, chocolate sauce, and sprinkles. It's the perfect blend of coffee and chocolate. (can be made with alternative milk and cocoa powder  sweetened )

hasMenuItem.name: Africano
hasMenuItem.description: The Africano is made with our world class espresso on top of a 1/2 cup of hot water and the other half is velvety smooth steamed milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Flat White
hasMenuItem.description: Silky Smooth steamed milk poured on top of our espresso mill blend. Little Foam on top.

hasMenuItem.name: Cappuccino
hasMenuItem.description:
This popular and delicious drink is expertly crafted by hand and made just for you. A perfect shot of our world-class espresso piggybacks an unruly mountain of thick-textured milk foam. 
* Due to certain circumstances, cappuccino foam may dissipate when the drink arrives leaving a space inside the cup.*

hasMenuItem.name: London Fog
hasMenuItem.description: Stone ground is absorbed in hot water which is powdered earl grey tea leaves with raw sugar added. Standard recipe is earl grey loose leaf tea steeped in hot water and vanilla syrup is added.

hasMenuItem.name: Matcha Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Try our organic stone-milled matcha, it's made fresh to order & topped with silky smooth steamed milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Loose Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Our teas are organically grown and carefully selected bringing together a combination of herbs, flowers, spices and fruits. Each cup is full of flavor and has an amazing aroma.

hasMenuItem.name: Turmeric Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy this delicious blend of stone-ground rooibos tea, turmeric, organic chamomile tea extract, and other organic spices. Naturally caffeine free and full of flavors.

hasMenuItem.name: Chai Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Serious Coffee Masala Chai is made with our  signature brew recipe or the bold tasting stone-ground. Each drink will be topped with silky smooth steamed milk.

hasMenuItem.name: Coldbuster
hasMenuItem.description: Coldbuster can help you tame that stuffy cold feeling – the honey will soothe your sore throat and the hint of cayenne will clear your sinuses right up; while the groggy feeling is shaken off with a burst of ginger and citrus. Made with stone-ground rooibos tea from south Africa, ginger, citrus, all natural honey crystals and cayenne pepper.

hasMenuItem.name: Steamer
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy a cup of micro-foamed steamed milk with a flavored syrup.

hasMenuItem.name: Hot Chocolate
hasMenuItem.description: Indulge in a cup of rich chocolaty steamed goodness made with delicious island farms milk and our special chocolate sauce. Add whipped cream and shaved chocolate for that extra kick. (Milk alternatives and cocoa power sweetened available)

hasMenuItem.name: Hot Apple Caramel Cider
hasMenuItem.description: Our hot apple cider is made with a blend of 100% real apple juice, caramel and special spices that will make you feel warm even on the coldest of days.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Caramel Macchiato
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy this creamy rich caramel drink with hints of vanilla and our signature espresso throughout. Top it with whipped cream and it's a delightful treat!

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Latte
hasMenuItem.description: Our iced latte is made the same way as our regular lattes starting with our fresh, air-roasted espresso. Choose from different syrup and milk options to personalize our most popular iced drink.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Mocha
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy this chocolatey iced drink with a double shot of our signature espresso blend.

hasMenuItem.name: Cold Brew
hasMenuItem.description: Enjoy one of our world class roasts chilled and steeped overnight.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Chai Latte
hasMenuItem.description: The iced chai is shaken over ice which brings out the different hints of  spices with a little bit of sweetness. (milk substitutes available)

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Americano
hasMenuItem.description: Our signature espresso is poured over iced water.  Can add milk and flavored syrups.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced London Fog
hasMenuItem.description: The Iced London Fog is made one of 2 ways at Serious Coffee. Try the traditional loose leaf tea which is steeped perfectly giving a smooth creamy taste or another way is our stone-ground tea which is more bold in taste with a more textured consistency.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Each Iced Tea made is steeped perfectly and then handshaken over ice. The drink can be sweetened or unsweetened with cane sugar syrup (Vegan Certified).

hasMenuItem.name: Italian Soda
hasMenuItem.description: These drinks are a personalized creation. Choose from any one of our sugar-free or regular flavored syrups, which is then poured into carbonated soda.

hasMenuItem.name: Chocolate Milk
hasMenuItem.description: Our chocolate milk is partly skimmed and is great for all ages. We have alternative milk options like oat, almond, coconut and soy.

hasMenuItem.name: UpBeet Iced Tea w/Raspberry
hasMenuItem.description: The fusion of beet root and raspberries gives a sweet and colorful drink.

hasMenuItem.name: White Milk
hasMenuItem.description: We have a variety of milk options to choose from. Add a flavor of syrup to put a little twist on it.

hasMenuItem.name: Peach Smoothie
hasMenuItem.description: The Peach smoothie is great anytime, anywhere. Enjoy the taste of peaches in a refreshing drink.

hasMenuItem.name: Strawberry Smoothie
hasMenuItem.description: The Strawberry smoothie is great anytime, anywhere. Enjoy the taste of strawberries in a refreshing drink.

hasMenuItem.name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
hasMenuItem.description: The Strawberry Banana smoothie is great anytime, anywhere. Enjoy the taste of Strawberry Banana in a refreshing drink.

hasMenuItem.name: Mango Smoothie
hasMenuItem.description: The Mango smoothie is great anytime, anywhere. Enjoy the taste of mangos in a refreshing drink.

hasMenuItem.name: Iced Cappuccino
hasMenuItem.description: Made with our signature espresso and then blended with your choice of milk, it's airy and tasty.

hasMenuItem.name: Cinnamon Apple Bomb (Wheat Free)
hasMenuItem.description: A delicious snack with sliced granny apples and hints of cinnamon.

hasMenuItem.name: Vegetarian Samosa (Vegan)
hasMenuItem.description: Contains wheat, potatoes, peas, carrots, chili, turmeric, garlic, ginger, salt, and spices.

hasMenuItem.name: Peanut Crunch Bar (GF)
hasMenuItem.description:
The peanut crunch is a perfect balance between Sweet and Savour, Crunchy and Chewy. 

It's peanut butter taste and crunchy chewiness will have you wanting more!

Gluten-free. (celiac friendly), contains peanuts, dairy, and soy.

hasMenuItem.name: Lemon Poppyseed Loaf GF
hasMenuItem.description: Laughing Daughters lemon poppyseed loaf is light bodied and tasty.  If you want to treat yourself with something delightful that won't give you regrets, then try this one.

hasMenuItem.name: Peppermint Nanaimo Bar (Vegan & GF)
hasMenuItem.description: The peppermint nanaimo bar has a chocolatey top and bottom with a minty filling.

hasMenuItem.name: Oat Fudge Bar
hasMenuItem.description: Chewy Oats Marbled into our fudgy chocolate  brownie.

hasMenuItem.name: Fudge Brownie
hasMenuItem.description: If you love rich, fudge-like chocolate, then you need to try this brownie.

hasMenuItem.name: Lemon Square
hasMenuItem.description: One of the popular snack items Serious Coffee has. It is well-balanced with sweetness and tart.

hasMenuItem.name: Cherry Yogurt Danish
hasMenuItem.description: A pure butter pastry created with a flaky, crisp and airy croissant dough. The generous filling is made with a perfect blend of greek yogurt, cream cheese and a cherry filling. Truly delicious!

hasMenuItem.name: Big Cookie
hasMenuItem.description: Baked in-house. Choose from, Chewy Chocolate Chip, Peanut Butter, Double Chocolate and White Chocolate Macadamia.

hasMenuItem.name: Very Berry Scone
hasMenuItem.description: Delicious Seasonal BlackBerries, Raspberries and Blueberries infused into a sweet scone.

hasMenuItem.name: Lemon Cranberry Monster Muffin
hasMenuItem.description: Loaded with Cranberries and lemon flavor. Baked fresh daily.

hasMenuItem.name: Blueberry Monster Muffin
hasMenuItem.description: This muffin is packed with blueberries and flavor. Baked fresh daily.

hasMenuItem.name: Canned Pop
hasMenuItem.description: Pepsi Only

hasMenuItem.name: Serious Bottled Water
hasMenuItem.description: Pure spring water sourced from a pristine environment, bottled for convenience. 500 mL.

hasMenuItem.name: Trekie (Dark Roast)
hasMenuItem.description: Bold Spicy aromas are complimented by sweet earthy tastes of cocoa and ginger. * Cupping notes: Candied Ginger, Cocoa and Brown Sugar *

hasMenuItem.name: Island Sunrise Organic (Light Roast)
hasMenuItem.description: Wake up to the delicate aromas of sweet pears and garden fresh snow peas. This medium-bodied light roast is balanced with floral notes and a sweet citrus finish. * Cupping notes: Caraway. Snow Peas, Vanilla & Pears. Beans: Organic Mexico & Organic Guatemala*

hasMenuItem.name: 3 Amigos (Medium Roast)
hasMenuItem.description:
Three beans from unique growing regions have been roasted to perfection. This light bodied, medium roast offers complex, zesty aromas and a sweet creamy finish.

* Cupping Notes: Sweet Corn, Leather, Caramel, & Lemon Zest.
Beans: Colombia, Costa Rica & Mexico *

hasMenuItem.name: Colombia Full City (Medium Dark Roast)
hasMenuItem.description:
One of the world's most renowned coffee beans roasted to a medium dark level. Medium bodied with sweet citrus aromas, complimented by tastes of macadamia nuts and honey. 

* Cupping Notes: Tangerine, Toffee & Macadamia Nuts. Beans: Colombia *

hasMenuItem.name: Coal Miners Organic (Dark Roast)
hasMenuItem.description: This organic dark roast is our most popular coffee. Full bodied with chocolatey floral aromas, it is perfectly balanced with a surprisingly sweet finish. * Cupping notes: Chocolate, Blueberry, Anise & Cherry Blossom *

hasMenuItem.name: Coal Miners Decaf (Dark Roast)
hasMenuItem.description: Decaffeinated using an organic chemical free process. A full bodied dark roast with aromas of vanilla, toast, and cloves. Hints of caramel and chocolate compliment this amazing organic coffee. * Cupping note: Cloves, Almond, Vanilla & Sweet Chocolate. Beans: Organic Peru, Organic Mexico *

hasMenuItem.name: Malahat Organic (Medium Dark Roast)
hasMenuItem.description:
A wonderful Coffee to compliment your favourite dessert. This medium bodied dark roast offers honey-like aromas with tastes of black currant, walnuts, and a mild smokey cedar finish. 

* Cupping notes: Black Currant, Walnuts, honey & Cedar. Beans: Organic Mexico & Organic Peru. *

hasMenuItem.name: Espresso (Medium Dark Roast)
hasMenuItem.description: Producing a rich, thick crema, our espresso sits proud on its own or compliments the best of steamed milk. A heavy bodied medium-dark blend with candied aromas finishing with notes of malted chocolate.  * Cupping notes: Swiss Chocolate, Lemon, Pralines & Molasses. Beans: Central & South America, Indonesia *

hasMenuItem.name: Loose Leaf Tea
hasMenuItem.description: Serious Coffee loose leaf tea comes from a locally sourced bee apiary on Vancouver Island. Each herb and spice is carefully grown, cut and harvested so you can enjoy an aromatic tasteful cup of tea.

review.reviewBody: Protein power wrap SLAPS. Also I'm was never a coffee drinker, but I've been turned into an addict lately with their Latte's. Loaf's are always good, no matter what flavour I choose.
My new favourite place! Love the custom sandwich option and the coffees I've tried so far have been delicious. Highly recommend!

Serious coffee is my go to place for breakfast when I don't want to make my own. Their gluten-free bread is absolutely delicious and is also dairy and nut free! I love that I can make my own sandwich that can fit within my dietary restrictions. Also, give their Nanaimo bars a try. They are heavenly!
DELICIOUS! Arrived hot and was so full of flavour! Sin-a-bun was sooo fluffy and yummy! Highly recommend!
Grilled cheese tasted really good and was a good size. London fog and mint nanaimo bar were also great!
